event-1.name: The Current State of Sass
event-1.description: Chris Eppstein, creator of Compass, talks about what's to come in Sass 3.3, and Alan Hogan on simplifying responsive web design with Sass

speaker-1.name: Chris Eppstein
speaker-1.bio: I'm the creator of [compass-style](compass-style.org)Compass, a stylesheet authoring framework and I'm on the core team of Sass — the stylesheet syntax upon which Compass is built. I maintain about a dozen less well known ruby libraries and rails plugins on github, and am an active contributor of patches to the many open source projects that I use.
speaker-1.title: title of the speaker's presentation
speaker-1.description: this is a longer description for a speaker's topic if we have multiple speakers
